languages.text: "Бледная серость душит плебса подобно мертвой петле — его слова полнятся страхом за наше здравие. Но еще больше — за свое собственное".
"Pale greyness is strangling this peasant like a noose — his words are laden with fear for our well-being. And yet he fears for his own even more."
languages.original_text: "Бледная серость душит плебса подобно мертвой петле — его слова полнятся страхом за наше здравие. Но еще больше — за свое собственное".

traits.locale_text: "Pale greyness is strangling this peasant like a noose — his words are laden with fear for our well-being. And yet he fears for his own even more."
"Pale greyness is strangling this peasant like a noose — his words are laden with fear for our well-being. And yet he fears for his own even more."
"Pale greyness is strangling this peasant like a noose — his words are laden with fear for our well-being. And yet he fears for his own even more."
"Pale greyness is strangling this peasant like a noose — his words are laden with fear for our well-being. And yet he fears for his own even more."
"Pale greyness is strangling this peasant like a noose — his words are laden with fear for our well-being. And yet he fears for his own even more."

languages.text: 「この農民は青白さに絞め殺されているかのようで、私たちの安否を心配している彼の言葉は恐れに満ちています。しかし、彼は自分自身の安否をさらに恐れています」
languages.original_text: "Pale greyness is strangling this peasant like a noose — his words are laden with fear for our well-being. And yet he fears for his own even more."

traits.locale_text: 「この農民は青白さに絞め殺されているかのようで、私たちの安否を心配している彼の言葉は恐れに満ちています。しかし、彼は自分自身の安否をさらに恐れています」

languages.text: « Une aura grise étouffe ce paysan comme une corde au cou. Ses mots sont alourdis par son inquiétude pour notre bien-être. Et pourtant, il craint encore plus pour le sien. »
languages.original_text: "Pale greyness is strangling this peasant like a noose — his words are laden with fear for our well-being. And yet he fears for his own even more."

traits.locale_text: « Une aura grise étouffe ce paysan comme une corde au cou. Ses mots sont alourdis par son inquiétude pour notre bien-être. Et pourtant, il craint encore plus pour le sien. »

languages.text: “这个农奴的脖子上挂着苍白的灰色，就像绞索一样。他的话语中充满了对我们的担心，不过他更担心他自己的性命。”
languages.original_text: "Pale greyness is strangling this peasant like a noose — his words are laden with fear for our well-being. And yet he fears for his own even more."

traits.locale_text: “这个农民的脖子上挂着苍白的灰色，就像绞索一样。他的话语中充满了对我们的担心，不过他更担心他自己的性命。”

languages.text: «Una pálida negrura estrangula a este plebeyo como si de una soga se tratara. Sus palabras están cargadas de temor por nuestro bienestar. Y, aun así, teme aún más por el suyo».
languages.original_text: "Pale greyness is strangling this peasant like a noose — his words are laden with fear for our well-being. And yet he fears for his own even more."

traits.locale_text: «Una pálida negrura estrangula a este plebeyo como si de una soga se tratara. Sus palabras están cargadas de temor por nuestro bienestar. Y, aun así, teme aún más por el suyo».

languages.text: "Ein blasses Grau erstickt diesen Mann wie eine Henkersschlinge. Seine Worte sind voller Angst um unser Wohlergehen. Und doch ängstigt er sich um sein eigenes noch mehr."
languages.original_text: "Pale greyness is strangling this peasant like a noose — his words are laden with fear for our well-being. And yet he fears for his own even more."

traits.locale_text: "Ein blasses Grau erstickt diesen Mann wie eine Henkersschlinge. Seine Worte sind voller Angst um unser Wohlergehen. Und doch ängstigt er sich um sein eigenes noch mehr."

languages.text: "Silik bir grilik, bu köylünün boynunu ilmek gibi sıkıyor. Sözcükleri, esenliğimize duyduğu endişeyle yüklü olsa da kendisi için duyduğu korku ağır basıyor."
languages.original_text: "Pale greyness is strangling this peasant like a noose — his words are laden with fear for our well-being. And yet he fears for his own even more."

traits.locale_text: "Silik bir grilik, bu avamı ilmik gibi bağlıyor. Sözcükleri, esenliğimize duyduğu endişeyle yüklü olsa da kendisi için duyduğu korku daha da büyük."
